unnormalised: Film Festivals: The Spice of Cinema!
normalised: Film Festivals: The Spice of Cinema!

unnormalised: Okay, cinephiles, listen up! Festival season is officially ON! From Cannes to Kerala, there's a whole lotta celluloid action happening. Word on the street (well, Twitter) is that the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for a blockbuster edition later this year. Think cutting-edge indie flicks and a whole lot of Bollywood glamour!
normalised: Okay, cinephiles, listen up! Festival season is officially ON! From Cannes to Kerala, there's a whole lot of celluloid action happening. Word on the street (well, Twitter) is that the J-i-o M-A-M-I Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for a blockbuster edition later this year. Think cutting-edge indie flicks and a whole lot of Bollywood glamour!

unnormalised: And speaking of Kerala, the International Film Festival of Kerala (IFFK) in Thiruvananthapuram is always a highlight. Imagine, catching a world premiere then digging into some delicious Onam sadhya! Now that's a vibe!
normalised: And speaking of Kerala, the International Film Festival of Kerala (I-F-F-K) in Thiruvananthapuram is always a highlight. Imagine, catching a world premiere then digging into some delicious Onam sadhya! Now that's a vibe!

unnormalised: Don't forget the smaller, more regional fests too! They're often where you discover true gems. Remember that gem from Guwahati last year? Who knew you could get such interesting stories from 50 km from the city center! So keep your eyes peeled for announcements, and grab those early bird tickets. Trust us, it's worth the Rs. 500 registration fee just for the samosas alone! Get your film fix!
normalised: Don't forget the smaller, more regional fests too! They're often where you discover true gems. Remember that gem from Guwahati last year? Who knew you could get such interesting stories from fifty kilometer from the city center! So keep your eyes peeled for announcements, and grab those early bird tickets.
